TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to re-light the Skullguard beacon
You have failed to re-light the Iceguard beacon
You must journey to Skullguard Keep and Iceguard Keep. There you must capture Fire Elementals to re-light the beacon fires.
You must journey to Skullguard Keep. There you must capture Fire Elementals to re-light the beacon fires.
You must journey to Iceguard Keep. There you must capture Fire Elementals to re-light the beacon fires.
You have been rewarded for re-lighting both beacons.
You have succeeded in re-lighting the Skullguard beacon.
You have succeeded in re-lighting the Iceguard beacon.
